translated: The Collection of Birth Stories, 1st Section

analyzed: naḷa pāna jātaka  disvā padam anuttiṇṇa
translated: The Birth Story of Naḷapāṇi🔽“Having seen the path not crossed,
Having seen the path not yet crossed;
I will drink water with a reed,

analyzed: na iva mama tvam vadhissasi iti  naḷapānajātakam dasama
translated: You will not kill me.”🔽The Birth Story of Naḷapāṇi is the tenth.
Not, does not exist, with flavors, rough, etc.;
With the reed, is freed, become ten.
